KitKat::
She looked at Blackfang. "Trust is earned. And besides, I am a 
Predacon, not a Decpeticon. Different programs. Besides, trust isn't 
something that my programs deal with easily."  She took a closer step 
and looked into his optics.  "Trust must be earned on both sides."  
She turned and took a few paces away from him. Her voice showing 
restraint as she tried to keep her emotional chip at bay. "Besides, 
I'm a warrior. And a Predacon warrior trusts no one."  She lowered 
her head and closed her optics. "No matter how.....much they might 
want to."  Her spark wanted him, but she knew that she couldn't let 
her spark go. Not to a maximal. Not now, not with the war. Not yet. 



Cam::
She had crouched down and snuck up behind one of the drones. She 
crept right next to it, then, with her little reflexes, she jumped up 
on top of the drone. It spun around. She held  tight and reached for 
the deactivation button.  She pressed it and the drone sank to the 
ground. She sat up in fox kit mode and looked at Blackfang and 
KitKat. Neither bot was paying attention to her. So, she decided to 
fix that. She yelled at them in her small voice, "HEY! LOOK! I DID 
IT!"


KitKat::
She turned and looked at the little maximal. "Well done kid. Now get 
the rest of them. One is good, but let's see if you can do that every 
time."

Camoflage::
She did a back flip and yelped back. "SURE I CAN! JUST YOU WATCH!"  
And off she went to take out the next drone.

KitKat::
She couldn't help but chuckle. "Ahh, and she reminds me of me when I 
was that young. Out to prove that I could take on the universe with a 
single paw." she said with another chuckle and a smile.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> He decided to keep his thpughts to himself for a few moments and to
> start the exercice.
> 
> Blackfang: Ready Cam? Here we go!
> 
> Ten drones went into hiding in the woods.
> 
> Blackfang: There's one point on which you're wrong, Kitkat. Windlord
> trusts Empath, and she's a Decepticon. Likewise, I could get to 
trust
> you. If you are trustworthy to me, then even my commanders would 
have
> nothing to say about it, not even old Yggie. Now, the question is,
> would you let me trust you?
> 
> He was looking intently in her eyes with a mix of hope and sadness. 
He
> loved her very much, and even if they had opposed ideologies, it
> mattered not to him.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> > Camoflage::
> > 
> > She jumped up and down at Blackfang. "Oh Yeah! I wanna cambat! I 
can 
> > do it this time I promise Blackfang!  I can take on the drones! 
Just 
> > Watch me. You'll See." she said with the biggest grin on her 
small 
> > face plates. 
> > 
> > KitKat::
> > She couldn't help but chuckle at the little bot. She reminded her 
of 
> > herself at that age. Ready to show the whole of Cybertron that 
she 
> > was out to be the best pred out there. She shook her head 
slightly. 
> > "Think you got what it takes huh kid?"
> > 
> > Camoflage:
> > She shook her head up and down. "Oh yeah! I can take them out. 
Easy. 
> > Blackfang showed me how. Just have to jump on the tops of them 
and 
> > hit the switch on the back. I've been practicing. I'm not as good 
as 
> > Blackfang yet. But I will be soon. I just have to get a little 
> > bigger."
> > 
> > KitKat::
> > She nodded her head. "You know kid, you'd make a good predacon 
one of 
> > these days." 
> > 
> > Camoflage:
> > "A Predacon? Aren't they bad?"
> > 
> > KitKat::
> > "Bad? Since when was a Predacon bad? All we want is the right to 
rule 
> > this planet as we are destined to. Predacons are supposed to rule 
> > over all the CyberLife. It's been told to us since the dawn of 
> > Cybertron. I just can't figure out why the maximals stand in the 
way 
> > of that?"
> > 
> > Camoflage::
> > She scratched the top of her head. "Why are the Predacons 
supposed to 
> > make up all the rules? Why can't we just be friends? Like we are 
now?"
> > 
> > KitKat::
> > She looked at Blackfang and sighed heavily. She felt her welcome 
> > would be short lived. She turned and looked at Cam. "Look little 
one. 
> > The matrix has set things into action. We Preds are going to 
fight 
> > for our right to rule. And the Maximals will forever stand in the 
way 
> > of that destiny. We will never get along. It's just not ment to 
be."
> > 
> > Camoflage::
> > She walked up to KitKat and stood infront of her. "But we're 
friends. 
> > If we are friends, then why can't the others just be friends like 
we 
> > are?"
> > 
> > KitKat::
> > She knelt down and looked Cam in the optics. "Because kid, no 
Maximal 
> > will ever trust a Predacon if his spark depended on it. No bot 
can go 
> > against thier own programming," she looked up at Blackfang, "no 
> > matter how much they want to."  She looked back at Cam. "Now, 
let's 
> > see you take on a drone by yourself." She patted Cam on the head 
and 
> > stood up. 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:

was
